meanings.definition: A vacation taken by a newly married couple.
meanings.sent1: They planned their honeymoons to a tropical island for relaxation.
meanings.sent2: The honeymoons to Paris was filled with romantic walks along the Seine River.
meanings.sent3: The couple's honeymoons to the mountains was a breath of fresh air after the wedding stress.
meanings.sent4: Their honeymoons was a journey into paradise, away from the hustle and bustle of daily life.
meanings.sent5: The honeymoons was a dream come true, a time to cherish forever.

meanings.sent1: They honeymoonsed to Hawaii for their first trip as a married couple.
meanings.sent2: Next month, they plan to honeymoons to Europe for their anniversary.
meanings.sent3: The couple decided to honeymoons to the beach for some sun and relaxation.
meanings.sent4: She dreams of honeymoonsing to exotic destinations around the world.
meanings.sent5: They will honeymoons to the countryside to enjoy nature's beauty.

meanings.definition: The early period of a new relationship characterized by intense happiness and love.
meanings.sent1: Their relationship was in the honeymoons phase, full of laughter and joy.
meanings.sent2: During the honeymoons of their love, everything seemed perfect and magical.
meanings.sent3: The couple's friends teased them about being in the honeymoons stage of their relationship.
meanings.sent4: In the honeymoons of their romance, they couldn't stop smiling at each other.
meanings.sent5: The honeymoons of their love story was like a fairy tale come to life.
